title: Steven Tyler asks Donald Trump to stop using song
text: Steven Tyler asks Donald Trump to stop using song Sunday, 11 October 2015 (8 minutes ago) He sent the Republican presidential candidate a cease-and-desist letter about 'Dream On.' Donald Trump Receives Legal Threat Over Use of Aerosmith's "Dream On" 00:42 Donald Trump is getting scorned by a musician he seemingly adores. On Saturday, Aerosmith frontman Steven Tyler's reps sent Donald Trump for President Inc. a demand to stop using the power ballad "Dream On" at campaign events. The cease-and-desist was actually the second time Trump has been warned... Recent related news Attorneys for Aerosmith frontman Steven Tyler asks Donald Trump to stop using 'Dream On' song ABCNews.com 34 minutes ago - Front Page You Might Like
